titleStmt.title: An A.B.C. for layemen, othervvise called, the lay-mans letters An alphabet for lay-men, deliuering vnto them such lessons as the holy Ghost teaches them in the worde, by thinges sensible, very necessary to be diligently considered.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1540-1605.

titleStmt.title: An A.B.C. for layemen, othervvise called, the lay-mans letters An alphabet for lay-men, deliuering vnto them such lessons as the holy Ghost teaches them in the worde, by thinges sensible, very necessary to be diligently considered.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert VValdegraue for Thomas Man and William Brome,

notesStmt.note: Quire D missigned C; signature E omitted from sequence.
